description: Derive the Golden Ratio φ. Title 'The Golden Ratio φ' starts CENTER then animates UP. Use Text() not Tex or MathTex. Step 1: Draw a line divided into parts a and b. Use Text labels not Brace.get_text. Step 2: Show the property (a+b)/a = a/b = φ as Text. Step 3: Solve the equation algebraically: φ² = φ + 1. Step 4: Use quadratic formula to get φ = (1 + √5)/2. Use √ symbol. Step 5: Calculate φ = 1.618. Final: 'φ = 1.618...' in yellow as single Text object.
title: Geometry Dash Challenge
